language.name: Tosk Albanian
language.maps: Greece and The Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia

translations.name: ECM Version
translations.description: In 1993, European Christian Mission produced the first bound copy of the entire Bible in Albanian, prepared by Stephen Etches. Bible smuggler Brother Andrew came personally to Albania to present this Bible to the country's president and people. This version which was a dynamic equivalent translation similar to the English Good News Bible or German Gute Nachricht translation is now out of print. In 2003 this was reprinted by the Albanian Interconfessional Bible Society.
